actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to amend the Export-Import Bank Act of 1945 to establish a minimum interest rate for loans to nonmarket economy countries by the Export-Import Bank.

summary.text: Establishes, under the Export-Import Bank Act of 1945, a minimum interest rate for loans to nonmarket economy countries by the Export-Import Bank. (Amends 12 U.S.C. 635 (b) (1))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Export-Import Bank Act of 1945 to establish a minimum interest rate for loans to nonmarket economy countries by the Export-Import Bank.
